name: The Coven of P.S. 13
description:
This game is part of the Locally Sourced Autumn Bundle.

You are a high school student at P.S. 13. And you’re a witch.

The Coven of P.S. 13 is “The Craft” meets “Mean Girls.” It’s a game that lets you and some friends tell the story of high school witches gaining power and causing drama.

You and your coven will plan for a big event occurring on the night of the full moon. In the daytime, you’ll act out scenes from high school or the local mall. At night, you’ll gather with your coven to perform a ritual. Not everything will be easy. Your personal nemesis and even your fellow witches might purposefully knock you off your game.

You’ll need 2-6 people, a set of polyhedral dice (D20, D10, D8, D6, and D4), and something to write on and with in order to play this game. Everyone shares the ability of storyteller and thus should share the spotlight as much as possible.

This game is an early release beta.
